text: Added to inventory
You still have items to find
What. The. Fuck
Hello Space Horse
Who is Space Horse? I'm Keith from Slough
I hate to tell you this, but you were in a major car accident, however we have performed life saving surgery, with one implication
What implication?
You're a horse
Space Horse was in shock. How was he a horse? Where is he? Sure technology was advanced but he never knew of someone becoming a horse?!
As Space Horse slept, the doctor had a worrying realisation
When transferring Space Horse's brain to his new body, I accidentally transferred the horse brain to a human...
Space Horse, I have a mission for you
What do you mean a fucking mission? I'm not some 007 shit, I'm KEITH from SLOUGH

I accidentally gave your old body a horse brain, and this human used his new opposable thumbs to start one of two time machines and is now causing trouble all across history by leaving items from our time period to stop these historic moments in time. Your mission is to go and stop him by collecting these items.
However, he did break our other time machine, but I believe the parts are scattered around this hospital room to rebuild it! Best of luck!
Hello there, I am Duchess Diplodocus! How may I help you dear today?
Uhh, have you seen a human round here recently?
What's a human?
Walks on two legs, has arms, pretty short?
All i know similiar to that is a stenonychosaurus
Yeh sure
Well yes then! There was one here earlier, though it made a very weird, un-stenonychosaurus like noise
What sort of noise?
NEIGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Uh yeh, that's the guy I'm looking for? Did he do anything weird?
He dropped something the started attracting all the rocks, and something that looked like a carved stick
Okay, I'll have a search around
ROAR roar roar
What the fuck, I can't communicate to this guy
Jokes on you fam, I can speak yo language
Oh haha, funny
Innit bruv, what you doing down these ends
I still can't communicate with you
Alright, alright, allow it. Who the hell are you?
Uh I'm a horse? Have you seen any weird things around recently?
Okay thanks!
Sphinx: Another challenger. I hope you're more resilient than the last one
Space Horse: Sorry who are you?
Sphinx: If you cannot comprehend what stands before you, how are you to entertain me?
Space Horse: Entertain you? What the fuck?
Spinx: One must risk everything in the pursuit of knowledge. If you can answer my questions wisely, you will have proven yourself worthy.
Narrator: The Sphinx will tell you three riddles, the answers will be found around Egypt to get you out of Egypt
Sphinx: I'm alive, but without breath. I'm as cold in life as in death. I'm never thirsty, though I always drink
Sphinx: If you feed me with food, I will survive. But if you make me drink water, I will perish
Sphinx: Never resting, never still. Moving silently from hill to hill. It does not walk, run or trot. All is cool where it is not
Plague Doctor: Hello there, do you have a fever? Vomiting? Any swelling?
Space Horse: Uh no... not that I'm aware of? What's going on?
Plague Doctor: How have you not heard about it, it's all the rage at the moment. The Black Death!
Space Horse: Oh fuck.
Plague Doctor: However, I might have found a cure, a rather strange man handed me these packets, and I have distributed them across the city. They were called 'Cold and Flu'
Space Horse: The strongest medicine on the planet...
Rat: Send help! There are all of these contraptions around this city!
Space Horse: What contraptions?
Rat: These rat traps! They're killing of all the rats, and the plague can't spread
Space Horse: Don't worry! Space horse is on it!
Rat: Mate you're not some fucking superhero
Poseidon: Ah Space Horse! You have made it at last
Space Horse: What do you mean, at last?
Poseidon: Well I've been talking with my friend Keith over here, and he seems to think he is trapped in the wrong body! I captured him trying to stop the plague.
Space Horse: Oh thank fuck, I've been travelling all over god knows where trying to find him... though I don't really care, I need to find Asclepius
Poseidon: No worries about Asclepius, I have an even better solution for you, I am the God of Horses after all
Space Horse: What's that?
Poseidon: Bibbidi bobbidi boo
Keith: Neigh
Keith: Fuck.
